Song.title: Not in Me
Song.copyright: Eric Shumacher and David L. Ward, © 2012 ThousandTongues.org Used by permission. All rights reserved.

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [F/C C Dm/C C | F/C C Am G | F/G C Dm C/E F | C G C]
Verse 1: No [F/C]list of [C]sins I [Dm/C]have not [C]done, no [F/C]list of [C]virtues [Am]I pu[G]rsue, No [F/G]list of [C]those I [Dm]am [C/E]not [F]like can earn my[C]self a [G]place with [C]you. O[C/E] God! Be [G]merci[F]ful to [C]me. I[C/E] am a s[G]inner [G/F]through and [Am]through. My [C/E]only [G]hope of [G/F]righteous[Am G F]ness is not in [C]me, but [G]only [C]yo[F/C]u
Verse 2: No [F/C]humble [C]dress, no [Dm/C]fervent [C]prayer, no [F/C]lifted [C]hands no [Am]tearful [G]song, No [F/G]reci[C]tation [Dm]of [C/E]the [F]truth can just[C]ify a [G]single [C]wrong. My [C/E]righteous[G]ness is [F]Jesus’ [C]life. My [C/E]debt was [G]paid by [G/F]Jesus [Am]death. My [C/E]weary [G]load was [G/F]borne by [Am G F]Him And He [C]alone can [G]give me rest.
instrumental: [C Dm C/E F | C G/B Am G | Am G/B C Dm |Am F G]
{new_page} Verse 3: No separ[D]ation [Em/D]from the [D]world, no [G/D]work I [D]do, no [Bm/D]gift I [A/D]give Can [G/D]cleanse my [D]conscience, [Em/D]cleanse [A/D]my h[G/D]ands, I cannot [D]cause my [A]soul to [D]live[Em7]. But [D/F#]Jesus [A]died and [G]rose [D]again. The [D/F#]pow’r of [A]death is [G]over[D]thrown! My [D/F#]God is [A]merci[A/G]ful to [Bm]me and [G]mercif[D/A]ul in [A]Christ [D]alone[Em7].
Tag: My [D/F#]righteous[A]ness is [G]Jesus’ [D]life. My [D/F#]debt was [A]paid by [A/G]Jesus [Bm]death. My [D/F#]weary [A]load was [A/G]borne by [Bm-A-G]him, and He a[D/A]lone can g[A]ive me [Bm]rest, And [G]He [D/A]alone can [A]give me [D]re[G/D]st. [D Em/D D Em/D D ]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 no list of sins i have not done no list of virtues i pursue no list of those i am not like can earn myself a place with you o god be merciful to me i am a sinner through and through my only hope of righteousness is not in me but only you verse 2 no humble dress no fervent prayer no lifted hands no tearful song no recitation of the truth can justify a single wrong my righteousness is jesus life my debt was paid by jesus death my weary load was borne by him and he alone can give me rest instrumental verse 3 no separation from the world no work i do no gift i give can cleanse my conscience cleanse my hands i cannot cause my soul to live but jesus died and rose again the powr of death is overthrown my god is merciful to me and merciful in christ alone tag my righteousness is jesus life my debt was paid by jesus death my weary load was borne by him and he alone can give me rest and he alone can give me rest
